tasks.instruction:
Improve the website for Tawin, a premium tech company competing with Microsoft and Apple. Make the following specific changes to the home screen:
1. Make the main body description font size smaller
2. Lower the position of the two buttons at the bottom
3. Space everything out evenly
4. Remove the dark filter on the PNG background if possible
5. Add improvements to make the website look as grand/premium as possible

Working directory: /workspace/shadcn-ui/src
Current technology: HTML and CSS

Deploy the improved Tawin website using MGX platform for preview.
Working directory: /workspace/uploads/workspace/shadcn-ui/src

Make additional improvements to the Tawin website based on user feedback:

1. Add a slight dark gradient filter over the background image on the home screen to make the golden text more readable
2. Fix the "Our Services" button scroll functionality to ensure it brings users all the way down to the services section
3. Improve the popup boxes functionality:
   - Fix hovering behavior (they should expand on hover, not on release)
   - Ensure expanded boxes are fully visible within the screen view (especially the middle box)
   - User should not need to scroll down further to see more info

Working directory: /workspace/uploads/workspace/shadcn-ui/src
